Key Match Events: Rhys Hoskins launched a grand slam in the first inning
The Brewers got clutch hits in the fourth inning before piling on in the eighth inning
Pre-Game Insights: Brewers manager Pat Murphy said it's like a football team, they got to be able to beat you in more than one way
Post-Match Reflections: Brandon Nimmo said the Brewers are the best bullpen in the NL
Carlos Mendoza said the Brewers have elite stuff
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Brewers have the third-youngest position-player group in baseball
The Brewers have scored the sixth-most runs in baseball
The Brewers have stolen nine bases without getting caught
Others: The Mets entered play ranking 19th in throwing runners out
The Brewers are locked in as the No. 3 seed in the National League
